document_data.mainbody:
Brus was a commoner child messenger and a nephew of the Shadow Thief named Gaelan Bayle from Athkatla in the late 14 century DR.
Brus was an affable young boy with brown skin and light brown hair.
By the  helped his uncle as a messenger and informant who led a group of Athkatlan youths, gathering rumors and kept an ear close to the gourd on various profitable opportunities around the City of Coin. Young Brus mightve helped Abdel Adrian, serving as a guide and pointing him towards various well-paying individuals in Athkatla when Gaelan Bayle, along with the Shadow Thieves offered to sell him information that would help rescue his sister Imoen.
